Functions.html#/s:4Wave7project5value8ve.name: project(value:velocity:decelerationRate:)
Functions.html#/s:4Wave7project5value8ve.abstract: Projects a scalar value based on a scalar velocity.

Functions.html#/s:4Wave7project5point8ve.name: project(point:velocity:decelerationRate:)
Functions.html#/s:4Wave7project5point8ve.abstract: Projects a 2D point based on a 2D velocity.

Functions.html#/s:4Wave8mapRange5value5i.name: mapRange(value:inMin:inMax:outMin:outMax:clip:)
Functions.html#/s:4Wave8mapRange5value5i.abstract: Takes a value in range (a, b) and returns that value mapped to another range (c, d) using linear interpolation.

Functions.html#/s:4Wave8mapRange_____4cl.name: mapRange(_:_:_:_:_:clip:)
Functions.html#/s:4Wave8mapRange_____4cl.abstract: The same function as mapRange(value:inMin:inMax:outMin:outMax:) but omitting the parameter names for terseness.

Functions.html#/s:4Wave4clip5value5lower.name: clip(value:lower:upper:)
Functions.html#/s:4Wave4clip5value5lower.abstract: Returns a value bounded by the provided range.

Functions.html#/s:4Wave8clipUnit5valuexx.name: clipUnit(value:)
Functions.html#/s:4Wave8clipUnit5valuexx.abstract: Returns a value bounded by the range [0, 1].

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC4Wav.name: animator
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC4Wav.abstract: Use the animator property to set any animatable properties on a UIView in an Wave.animateWith(...) animation block.

Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:So7CALayerC4W.name: animator
Extensions/CALayer.html#/s:So7CALayerC4W.abstract: Use the animator property to set any animatable properties on a CALayer in an Wave.animateWith(...) animation block.

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC4W.name: interpolate(from:to:with:)
Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC4W.abstract: Returns a UIColor by interpolating between two other UIColors.

Extensions/CGSize.html#/s:So6CGSizeV4Wav.name: scaledIntegral
Extensions/CGSize.html#/s:So6CGSizeV4Wav.abstract: Returns a size whose height and width are rounded to the nearest pixel boundary,

Extensions/CGRect.html#/s:So6CGRectV4Wav.name: scaledIntegral
Extensions/CGRect.html#/s:So6CGRectV4Wav.abstract: Returns a rect whose origin and size are rounded to the nearest pixel boundary,

Extensions/CGPoint.html#/s:So7CGPointV4W.name: scaledIntegral
Extensions/CGPoint.html#/s:So7CGPointV4W.abstract: Returns a point value whose x/y components are rounded to the nearest pixel boundary,

Extensions/CGFloat.html#/s:12CoreGraphic.name: scaledIntegral
Extensions/CGFloat.html#/s:12CoreGraphic.abstract: Returns a float value that is rounded to the nearest pixel boundary,

Enums/AnimatorState.html#/s:4Wave13Anima.name: inactive
Enums/AnimatorState.html#/s:4Wave13Anima.abstract: The animation is not currently running, but is ready.

Enums/AnimatorState.html#/s:4Wave13Anima.name: running
Enums/AnimatorState.html#/s:4Wave13Anima.abstract: The animation is currently active and executing.

Enums/AnimatorState.html#/s:4Wave13Anima.name: ended
Enums/AnimatorState.html#/s:4Wave13Anima.abstract: The animation has just stopped, and will be reset to the inactive state.

Enums/AnimationMode.html#/s:4Wave13Anima.name: nonAnimated
Enums/AnimationMode.html#/s:4Wave13Anima.abstract: The nonAnimated mode directly sets the Animation‘s value to the given value without animation.

Enums/AnimationMode.html.name: AnimationMode
Enums/AnimationMode.html.abstract: The mode that determines whether a block should be animated or not.

Classes/Wave.html#/s:4WaveAAC7animate10w.name: animate(withSpring:mode:delay:gestureVelocity:animations:completion:)
Classes/Wave.html#/s:4WaveAAC7animate10w.abstract: Performs animations based on the Spring value provided.

Classes/SpringAnimator/Event.html#/s:4Wa.name: retargeted(from:to:)
Classes/SpringAnimator/Event.html#/s:4Wa.abstract: Indicates that the animation’s target value was changed in-flight (i.e. while the animation was running).

Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.name: state
Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.abstract: The execution state of the animation (inactive, running, or ended).

Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.name: spring
Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.abstract: The spring model that determines the animation’s motion.

Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.name: value
Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.abstract: The current value of the animation. This value will change as the animation executes.

Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.name: target
Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.abstract: The current target value of the animation.

Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.name: valueChanged
Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.abstract: The callback block to call when the animation’s value changes as it executes. Use the currentValue to drive your application’s animations.

Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.name: completion
Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.abstract: The completion block to call when the animation either finishes, or “re-targets” to a new target value.

Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.name: mode
Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.abstract: The animation’s mode. If set to .nonAnimated, the animation will snap to the target value when run.

Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.name: integralizeValues
Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.abstract: Whether the values returned in valueChanged should be integralized to the screen’s pixel boundaries.

Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.name: init(spring:value:target:)
Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.abstract: Creates a new animation with a given Spring, and optionally, an initial and target value.

Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.name: start(afterDelay:)
Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.abstract: Starts the animation (if not already running) with an optional delay.

Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.name: stop(immediately:)
Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.abstract: Stops the animation at the current value.

Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.name: settlingTime
Classes/SpringAnimator.html#/s:4Wave14Sp.abstract: How long the animation will take to complete, based off its spring property.

Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC12da.name: dampingRatio
Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC12da.abstract: The amount of oscillation the spring will exhibit (i.e. “springiness”).

Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC8res.name: response
Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC8res.abstract: Represents the frequency response of the spring. This value affects how

Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC9sti.name: stiffness
Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC9sti.abstract: The spring constant k. Used as an alternative to response.

Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC4mas.name: mass
Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC4mas.abstract: The mass “attached” to the spring. The default value of 1.0 rarely needs to be modified.

Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC18da.name: dampingCoefficient
Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC18da.abstract: The viscous damping coefficient c. This value is derived.

Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC16se.name: settlingDuration
Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC16se.abstract: The time the spring will take to settle or “complete”. This value is derived.

Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC12da.name: init(dampingRatio:stiffness:mass:)
Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC12da.abstract: Creates a spring with the given damping ratio and frequency response.

Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC12da.name: init(dampingRatio:response:mass:)
Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC12da.abstract: Creates a spring with the given damping ratio and frequency response.

Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC18de.name: defaultInteractive
Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC18de.abstract: A reasonable, slightly underdamped spring to use for interactive animations (like dragging an item around).

Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC15de.name: defaultAnimated
Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC15de.abstract: A reasonable, critically damped spring to use for non-interactive animations.

Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC18de.name: defaultNonAnimated
Classes/Spring.html#/s:4Wave6SpringC18de.abstract: A placeholder spring to use when using the nonAnimated mode. See AnimationMode for more info.

Classes/ViewAnimator.html#/s:4Wave12View.name: scale
Classes/ViewAnimator.html#/s:4Wave12View.abstract: The affine scale transform of the attached UIView‘s layer.

Classes/ViewAnimator.html#/s:4Wave12View.name: translation
Classes/ViewAnimator.html#/s:4Wave12View.abstract: The affine translation transform of the attached UIView‘s layer.

Classes/LayerAnimator.html#/s:4Wave13Lay.name: borderColor
Classes/LayerAnimator.html#/s:4Wave13Lay.abstract: The border color of the attached layer.

Classes/LayerAnimator.html#/s:4Wave13Lay.name: shadowOpacity
Classes/LayerAnimator.html#/s:4Wave13Lay.abstract: The shadow opacity of the attached layer.

Classes/LayerAnimator.html#/s:4Wave13Lay.name: shadowColor
Classes/LayerAnimator.html#/s:4Wave13Lay.abstract: The shadow color of the attached layer.

Classes/LayerAnimator.html#/s:4Wave13Lay.name: shadowOffset
Classes/LayerAnimator.html#/s:4Wave13Lay.abstract: The shadow offset of the attached layer.

Classes/LayerAnimator.html#/s:4Wave13Lay.name: shadowRadius
Classes/LayerAnimator.html#/s:4Wave13Lay.abstract: The shadow radius of the attached layer.

Classes/LayerAnimator.html.name: LayerAnimator
Classes/LayerAnimator.html.abstract: The LayerAnimator class contains the supported CALayer animatable properties, like cornerRadius, shadowColor, shadowOpacity, and more.

Classes/ViewAnimator.html.name: ViewAnimator
Classes/ViewAnimator.html.abstract: The ViewAnimator class contains the supported UIView animatable properties, like frame, center, backgroundColor, and more.

Classes/Spring.html.name: Spring
Classes/Spring.html.abstract: Spring determines the timing curve and settling duration of an animation.
